suggestedTasks.title: Create Comprehensive Dependency Display Test Suite for TaskIdBadge
suggestedTasks.description: Develop a thorough test suite to validate dependency rendering across different task views. The tests should cover scenarios including tasks with multiple dependencies, nested dependencies, and edge cases in the TaskIdBadge component. Focus on ensuring consistent visualization in both task table and open tasks sections.
suggestedTasks.reason: Lack of existing test coverage for dependency display logic

suggestedTasks.title: Document Dependency Display Component Behavior
suggestedTasks.description: Create technical documentation explaining the current implementation of dependency visualization in TaskIdBadge. Include rendering rules, expected behavior in different contexts, and any potential limitations. This documentation will help future developers understand the component's design and maintenance requirements.
suggestedTasks.reason: Identified need for clearer component behavior documentation

gotchas: Potential variations in dependency display logic
